Title: Allows volunteer firefighters to attend training without being penalized by their employer; and creates tax incentives for employing volunteer firefighters
Summary: Allows volunteer firefighters to attend training required under 19 NYCRR 426 without being penalized by their employer; creates tax incentives for employing volunteer firefighters.
LawCode: Add §202-l-1, Lab L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; amd §181, Town L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, the tax law and the town law, in relation to allowing volunteer firefighters to attend training without being penalized by their employer; and creates tax incentives for employing volunteer firefighters
